name: wholewheat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Wholewheat flour, or food made from wholewheat flour contains all the natural features of the grain, with nothing taken away: The school has now switched from white bread to wholewheat bread for all its sandwiches. The old windmill still produces wholewheat flour using the traditional method. Spread the refried beans over a small whole wheat tortilla.
More examplesFewer examplesShe spread the hummus on wholewheat toast.They only eat wholewheat pasta because they think it is more healthy.He made three wholewheat loaves each week.We use both whole wheat and white flours in our bread.
